

```{r}
folder_name <- choose.dir(default = "", caption = "Select folder")
sub_folders <- list.dirs(folder_name, full.names = TRUE, recursive = FALSE)
split <- strsplit(sub_folders, '""')
sdt_file = 'LifetimeData_Cycle00001_000001.sdt'
for (i in split) 
{
  B = list.files(i)
  b = strsplit(B, '""')
  for (j in b){
    if (j == sdt_file){
      D = strsplit(i, "/")
      setwd(folder_name)
      E <- paste(D[[1]][2], ".sdt", sep = "")
      file.rename(paste(as.character(i),sdt_file, sep = "/"), paste(folder_name,E, sep = "/"))
    }
  }
}
```
